title: Is it true- axis bank credit card scam ?
selftext:
I am not sure if this is true, but there are a lot of posts about Axis bank credit card scam.
This is a retweet from an editor of mint..
comments: frauds are too easy these days

I dont think axis bank has any role to play.. this is brute force attack - i have had such transactions for 2 reputed banks and one of the cards was my spare card and i hadnt used it anywhere (online or offline) and still there were unauthorised txns
User privacy and data protections have gone for a toss.
cleaned_text: true axis bank credit card scam sure true lot posts axis bank credit card scam retweet editor mint
